title: What can you do after a BA in philosophy hons? - Quora

response.answer_text: Before, most philosophers became teachers or writers. But nowadays, the opportunities are much more diverse. There are a lot of philosophers in media, marketing and business. The world is in rapid change, and philosophers are experts of changing mindsets and perspectives. It’s a perfect background for being able to navigate in today's world and job market. But there is another answer, you might not want to hear at the moment. Studying philosophy might also change you. It certainly changed me! The big Greek philosopher Socrates said, “All I know is that I know nothing”. If you get to this point, things might become difficult. You might not want to take up a normal job at all. But that’s another story.
